header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.description: Everything you need to know about our AI prompt directory and how to make the most of it.

items.question: What is an AI prompt directory?
items.answer: An AI prompt directory is a curated collection of effective prompts designed to help you get better results from AI models. Our directory contains tested prompts for various use cases including writing, coding, analysis, creative tasks, and business applications. Each prompt is optimized to produce high-quality, consistent outputs from AI systems.

items.question: How do I use these prompts?
items.answer: Simply copy any prompt from our directory and paste it into your preferred AI tool (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, etc.). You can customize the prompts by replacing placeholder text with your specific requirements. For best results, read the prompt description and any usage notes provided with each template.

items.question: Can I contribute my own prompts?
items.answer: Yes! We welcome contributions from the community. You can submit your own tested prompts through our contribution form. All submissions are reviewed for quality and effectiveness before being added to the directory. We particularly value prompts that solve unique problems or improve upon existing solutions.

items.question: Are the prompts free to use?
items.answer: Absolutely! All prompts in our directory are free to use for personal and commercial purposes. We believe in making AI more accessible to everyone. You can use, modify, and share these prompts without any restrictions. Attribution is appreciated but not required.

items.question: What AI models work with these prompts?
items.answer: Our prompts are designed to work with most modern AI language models including OpenAI's GPT series, Anthropic's Claude, Google's Gemini, and other compatible models. While some prompts may work better with specific models, most are crafted to be model-agnostic and deliver good results across different platforms.

items.question: How often are new prompts added?
items.answer: We add new prompts regularly, typically several times per week. Our team continuously tests and curates new prompts based on community submissions, emerging AI capabilities, and popular use cases. Follow our blog or subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated on the latest additions.

items.question: Can I request specific types of prompts?
items.answer: Yes! We encourage prompt requests from our community. You can submit requests through our contact form or suggest new categories and use cases. While we can't guarantee every request will be fulfilled, we prioritize prompts that would benefit many users and align with our quality standards.

header.title: Get In Touch
header.description: Have questions about our AI prompts? Need help with implementation? We'd love to hear from you and help you succeed with AI.

content.subtitle: Let's Start a Conversation
content.description: Whether you're looking for specific AI prompts, have feedback on our collection, or want to collaborate, we're here to help. Send us a message and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
